channel.title: Kitsu Status
channel.description: Status alerts for Kitsu, an anime & manga tracker.

item.title: Site down for upgrades
item.content:encoded: Due to an unexpected issue with a software upgrade, Kitsu is temporarily down.

item.title: MAL Sync
item.content:encoded: MyAnimeList has added a Captcha to their login form and our sync is no longer working. We are working to move it over to their new API, but until then it will be down.

item.title: Moving To New Servers
item.content:encoded: We're moving Kitsu to new servers! We should be back online shortly, and if you have any questions you can talk to us on our Discord in #tech-support!

item.title: Kitsu Unavailable
item.content:encoded:
Due to an error, Kitsu is currently unavailable. We are actively working to restore access, and we ask for your patience.

2021-01-08T20:17:11.000Z
Recovering

We've restored access to Kitsu but our servers are still recovering and catching up, so the site may be slow for now.

2021-01-08T20:48:34.000Z
Resolved

Performance has recovered to normal levels and the site should be operating normally now.

item.title: Search Outage
item.content:encoded:
Our quick search is currently unavailable. Advanced search for anime & manga is unaffected by this outage.

2020-11-15T00:09:32.000Z
Resolved

This incident has been resolved.

item.title: Feed & Notifications Delayed
item.content:encoded:
Posts and notifications are not appearing on user feeds.

Posts are not being lost and will appear in user feeds when once the post queue has decreased. Comments and likes are not affected by this.

2020-08-17T14:38:07.000Z
Monitoring

We are investigating the cause of this incident.

2020-08-17T16:02:09.000Z
Update

There is an issue with our worker services that handle feed posts and notifications that are preventing them from being sent to users.

2020-08-17T16:48:26.000Z
Mitigated

The issue has been remediated and the queue for delivering posts and comments are going down. We are continuing to monitor for any futher issues.

2020-08-17T17:05:19.000Z
Resolved

This incident has been resolved.

item.title: DNS Outage
item.content:encoded:
Our domain auto-renewal payment was rejected by PayPal.

2020-08-10T19:20:00.000Z
Resolved

We have approved the rejected payment. Service may remain degraded for several hours while the DNS records re-propogate.

item.title: Login Problems
item.content:encoded:
Logins are failing, our engineers are working on the problem.

2020-07-30T19:35:24.000Z
Mitigated

There is an issue with a legacy database that stores Aozora data. We've disabled Aozora transfers for the moment to fix this for other users, and we will be restoring service for Aozora users shortly.

2020-07-30T19:45:00.000Z
Resolved

We've restored service for Aozora users, everything should be running smoothly again now!

item.title: Cloudflare Outage
item.content:encoded:
Our API is down in some areas due to a large internet provider outage. We are monitoring the situation and will keep you updated

2020-07-17T23:09:29.000Z
Resolved

Cloudflare has announced the all-clear and Kitsu should be reliably back online. Thank you for your patience

item.title: MAL Rate Limiting
item.content:encoded: MAL is rate limiting our synchronization system
